QuestData.Title: Karg Unchained
QuestData.Description: They took my brothers and sisters.$B$BThey took my wolf.$B$B<Karg lifts his axe and fixes his gaze upon its edge.>$B$BNow we take their heads.
QuestData.RewardText: <Karg scoops up a handful of snow and cleans the gore from his axe.>$B$BYou fight well.
